description:
Hogi Ayumu is a Senior http://anidb.net/t7112 [Ghoul Investigator] from the http://anidb.net/ch69612 [CCG] and the Deputy Squad Leader of the Hachikawa Squad. Ayumu was part of the http://anidb.net/ch95880 [Squad 3] in the Owl Suppression Operation.
Source: Tokyo Ghoul Wiki
name: Hogi Ayumu
